matrixApp

Module functions for creating matrixApp

matrixApp()

Launch Shiny app for exploration of relationships in annotated data with an interactive matrix

matrixAppServer()

Shiny app server for exploration of relationships in annotated data with an interactive matrix

matrixAppUI()

Shiny app UI for exploration of relationships in annotated data with an interactive matrix

matrixAsNetworkServer()

Server module server for network graph

matrixAsNetworkUI()

Shiny module UI for network graph

matrixCtrlServer()

Shiny module server functions to generate filter UI for interactive matrix

matrixCtrlUI()

Shiny module UI containing filter inputs for interactive matrix

matrixInteractiveServer()

Server module server for matrix with drilldown interaction

matrixInteractiveUI()

Shiny module UI for interactive matrix with drilldown component

matrixMainServer()

Server module server for matrix with drilldown interaction

matrixMainUI()

Shiny module UI for interactive matrix with drilldown component

dualDrilldownUI()

Shiny module UI for data drilldown interaction

dualDrilldownServer()

Server module server for data drilldown interaction

Module functions for creating matchApp

matchApp()

Launch Shiny app for matching between two datasets

matchAppServer()

Shiny app server for matching and exploration of two datasets

matchAppUI()

Shiny app UI for matching application

matchLinkServer()

Shiny server module for interactive drag-and-drop variable linkage or harmonization

matchLinkUI()

Shiny module UI for interactive drag-and-drop variable linkage or harmonization

matchPair()

Matching main function

matchPlotServer()

Shiny module server for comparison histodot plots of attributes in two datasets

matchPlotUI()

Shiny module UI for comparison histodot plots of attributes in two datasets

matchResultOutput()

Shiny module UI output for match results

matchResultServer()

Shiny module server for generating match results output

subgroupVServer()

xVServer()
